mandelight

Shortcuts

WASD Movement along x and y Axis
I/K Zoom in/Zoom out
L/J Increase/Decrease depth
U/O Import/Export
Q/E Stop/Start
F Fullscreen

Settings

Depth: How often do you want to iterate? Please enter an Integer!
The higher the value, the longer will the calculation take.
X-Translation: Translate the picture along the X-Axis.
Y-Translation: Transalte the picture along the Y-Axis.
Zoom: Zoom into the picture.
Colors:

Import/Export

To save the position you have to "export values". Note the text appearing in the text-box.
To load a saved position you have to paste your text into the text-box and "import values".
